uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame

Class SingleTileAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame.SingleTileAnalysis

  • public class SingleTileAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains the intervals that contain this tile and have the same CandyColour and forming a match (i.e. their lengths are greater than 2).

    • Field Summary
